explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of machine learning approaches, specifically artificial neural networks (ANNs), for financial time series analysis.
explanations.neural network: The paper explicitly mentions artificial neural networks (ANNs) as a method for financial time series forecasting.
explanations.deep learning: The paper proposes a hybrid model that includes deep learning techniques such as long short-term memory (LSTM) and gated recurrent unit (GRU) neural networks.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper specifically mentions LSTM as one of the neural network models used in the proposed hybrid approach.
explanations.LSTM: LSTM is mentioned as a component of the hybrid model proposed in the paper.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The paper discusses the use of recurrent neural networks (RNNs), specifically LSTM and GRU, for time series forecasting.
